Ingredients.6: 1 tablespoon sifted confectioners' sugar, or as needed (Optional)

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Grease 4 baking sheets.

Directions.2: Beat butter and brown sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer. Stir in vanilla extract. Stir in flour gradually; mixture will be crumbly. Add pecans and work into the dough.

Directions.3: Pinch off dough in teaspoons; roll in hands to form balls that are about 1/2-inch in diameter. Place onto the prepared baking sheets.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until firm and browned on bottoms, 15 to 18 minutes.

Directions.5: Remove from the oven and let cool slightly, about 5 minutes. Roll warm cookies in confectioners' sugar.
